titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to prescribe regulations to allow dependents of certain deceased veterans to use commissary and exchange stores on the same basis as dependents of certain other veterans.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 2/24/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense to provide military commissary and post exchange privileges to dependents of veterans who have died from a service-connected disability on the same basis as dependents of veterans who at the time of death were receiving disability compensation based upon a permanent and total service-connected disability.
